message:
Hey <@&1424461167883194418>! Grab your keyboards, it's time to build. üêù‚ú®

## üå∏ Weekly Update - 2026-02-11

This week wasn't just an update; it was a total **level up**. We've overhauled the look, packed the library with powerful new models, and gave the platform a fresh voice. Here is what you can play with right now:

üé• **Visuals & Video**
- **LTX-2 Video Model** is here! Create stunning AI video content directly in your apps.
- **Imagen 3 & Grok Imagine Video** joined the party via api.airforce. More choices = better art.
- **Frontend Glow-Up**: We redesigned the UI to be cleaner, faster, and cozier. The **Docs** are now merged right into the **Play** page, so you can learn while you build without tab-switching madness.

üéµ **Audio & Speech**
- **ElevenMusic**: Drop the beat with duration-based music generation.
- **OVH Whisper**: High-accuracy speech-to-text transcription is now live.
- **Polly Discord Bot**: A new friend in the server to help out.

üß† **Brains & Characters**
- **Claude Opus 4.6**: Smarter, faster, stronger.
- **Qwen Character**: A new model specifically tuned for roleplay and character interactions.
- (We also said goodbye to the unstable `flux-2-dev` to keep things smooth).

We also smoothed out the onboarding with auto-install scripts for OpenClaw. It‚Äôs never been easier to go from "zero" to "deployed".

Go break things (in a good way)! üå∏

**Stay playful.**
image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot sitting at a futuristic but retro 8-bit control station. The screens are glowing with lime green (#ecf874) and soft pastels, showing video clips and music waves. Floating pixel icons represent 'Video', 'Music', and 'Art'. Warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'LEVEL UP'. Nostalgic, celebratory, and inviting.
reasoning: This update highlights a massive influx of creative tools (video, music, speech) and a major UI overhaul, fitting the 'level up' theme perfectly for a builder community.
